entities.name: fi renze
entities.description: Fi renze is introduced as a calm and knowledgeable centaur who teaches Astronomy. He instructs Harry to lie back on the floor and observe the heavens.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has learned about the planets and their moons in Astronomy.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is introduced as a student who did Astrology with Professor Trelawney and excitedly shares her knowledge of Mars and Saturn.

relationships.description: Fi renze teaches Harry about the fortune of their races by observing the heavens.
Parvati associates Mars with accidents and burns, indicating that she has learned about its effects from Professor Trelawney's Astrology class.
